name: CreateOnboardingRequest
description:
Create a new onboarding request in Freshservice.

Use this tool to initiate a new employee onboarding process in Freshservice. It should be called when a new hire needs to be onboarded, capturing all necessary details and confirming the creation of the request.

parameters.name: onboarding_request_details
parameters.description: JSON containing required details for the new onboarding request, such as employee information and start date.

value_schema.description: onboarding request that needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: onboarding request that needs to be created

value_schema.description: onboarding request that needs to be created
